TopicTitle: KSP Career Mode - Full SAS unlocked from beginning

Articles.Content:
I started a new career mode and wonder why I have full SAS unlocked from the beginning when all my Kerbals are level 0. It is on the hardest difficulty and I have not turned this option on. This is a big game breaker since I obviously want to start from scratch.

Mods:

Astrogator, BoulderCO, Chatterer, DistantObject, EVE, Full auto strut, Kerbal Engineer, Planet shine, scatterer and breaking ground dlc

Sadly this is a 1.11.1 bug and not related to your mods.

It’s already reported on the bug tracker here

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27162

16 hours ago, Daedalus3000 said:

Sadly this is a 1.11.1 bug and not related to your mods.

It’s already reported on the bug tracker here

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27162 

 

Oh thank you for the reply I am hoping it will get fixed soon
yeah i have the bug to it is very anoying
I dunno why but as i downgraded my version to 1.10 it was normal again.
